19.ara-name: كتاب الأضاحى عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Narrated Muhammad bin 'Ali bin Al-Husain:That Ali bin Abi Talib said: "The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) had the 'Aqiqah for Al-Hasan with one sheep, and said: 'O Fatimah! Shave his head and give the weight of his hair in silver as charity.'" He said: "So I weighed it, and it was the weight of a Dirham or a bit of a Dirham
